belongs_to_collection.name: The Adventures of Young Indiana Jones Collection

original_title: The Adventures of Young Indiana Jones: Hollywood Follies
overview: In the twenty-second and final film in the series, in 1920's Hollywood, Indy is working as assistant to Hollywood movie mogul Carl Laemmle, who charges him to get notoriously megalomaniacal director Erich Von Stroheim to complete his latest epic on time and on budget... or else!
title: The Adventures of Young Indiana Jones: Hollywood Follies
